Pierre Arnout - Senior Python Engineer
Blog

Curriculum Vitæ Download as PDF

34 years old French Python Engineer with 15 years of working experience with APIs, Saas development and web-scraping.

Experiences

Fullstack Engineer @Pricehubble

2021 to 2024 - Remote - English

PriceHubble is a real estate insight and innovative Saas.

I designed, developed and maintained APIs and front-end features from the database schema to the webpage.

All three main Python frameworks - Django, Flask and FastAPI - were used, front-end was made with React.
For my part, I mostly focused on in-house and public APIs development, design and documentation.

Backend and Scraping Engineer Freelancer

2017 to 2021 - Remote - English

As a freelancer I helped my customers to build quality applications.

I mostly worked with three companies, two were focused on scraping solutions, the other was a Django REST application.

Backend Engineer @Fraudbuster

2014 to 2017 - Marseille - French

Fraudbuster helps mobile phone providers to detect and block fraud on their networks.

I was in charge of internal APIs used to display Fraudbuster’s data to its Data Scientists and customers with some DevOps aspect to the role.

APIs were made with Flask consuming a database PostgreSQL database, deployed on physical servers using Docker.

Backend and Scraping Engineer @MonsieurDrive

2012 to 2014 - Paris - French

MonsieurDrive (acquired by Cryteo since then) was a drive market price comparator.

I was in charge of scraping many sources, designing and building the whole orchestrating system including queuing / jobs, databases, parsers, scrapers and KPIs.

As the company and team grew I became manager of the scraping team of three developers.

Backend Engineer @Lengow

2009 to 2012 - Nantes - French

Lengow help e-retailers to transfer their catalog to many different platforms.

As backend engineer I was in charge of plugin-in many different APIs such as Rakuten, Rueducommerce and many more, I also helped to design internal APIs and database schemas.

More of that, I was in charge of a Magento plugin for our customers to expose an ad-hoc API from their websites to Lengow’s system.

Fullstack Developer Web agency

2007 to 2009 - France - French

Fullstack developer for two small sized web agencies.

References

Ovidiu Tindea - Product Leader @Pricehubble
